resources.string: Start wechat red envelope automatically getting service
Please open the Red Envelope service at the pop-up page!!!
Please close the Red Envelope service at the pop-up page
Can not get root permission, please bypass in the root manager
Please click the CLEAR DATA button(not the CLEAR CACHE button)at the pop-up page
Wechat red envelope service is running...

The application totally free and opensource.\n1.Alipay red envelope(Each time after your grab the red envelopes but do not get one, you can use this clear the application data easily and grap the envelopes again).\n2.Wechat red envelope( Open the wechat and start the red service and keep the screen on)
My team is not responsible for any loss by using this application

Before start the wechat red envelope service, open wechat application first, then press the Home button to go to launcher, open the Red Envelope Assistant and start the red envelope service, then everything will run automatically.
If get red envelopes in the chat page, we will exit the wechat\n If you want to chat normally, please close the service or use safe mode\n
Your can chat in this mode, but you have to manually click the red envelope yourself, then the application will open it for you
